Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at Balboa/Michigan
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via LSD, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balboa/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Balboa/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Clark/Lake.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
